name: The crook
description:
In a small town in storyland crook bandit planned the biggest heist of all time, the small bank just got robbed and crook bandit is on the loose!
Will you survive the tenacious swat force hunt that will try to take you in at any cost?
or will you make it to the end and buy yourself a secret island and live happily ever after?

Simpe and addictive game to play!
